text: Bihetoué Patrick Malo (born 18 February 1992) is a Burkinabé international footballer who plays for Egyptian club Smouha as a centre back. ==Career== Born in Ouagadougou, Malo has played for USFA, SOA, JS Kabylie and Smouha. Malo made his international debut in 2015, and was named in the squad for the 2017 Africa Cup of Nations. ==Personal life== Malo's father, Kamou, is currently manager of Burkina Faso. ==References== Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:Burkinabé footballers Category:Burkina Faso international footballers Category:US des Forces Armées players Category:Société Omnisports de l'Armée players Category:JS Kabylie players Category:Smouha SC players Category:Association football defenders Category:Burkinabé expatriate footballers Category:Burkinabé expatriate sportspeople in Ivory Coast Category:Expatriate footballers in Ivory Coast Category:Burkinabé expatriate sportspeople in Algeria Category:Expatriate footballers in Algeria Category:Burkinabé expatriate sportspeople in Egypt Category:Expatriate footballers in Egypt Category:2017 Africa Cup of Nations players Category:Egyptian Premier League players
title: Patrick Malo
